title: Game starts, but I can't see nothing but mouse.
body: First I had a problem running the patcher, but going into safe mode fixed it.  After that I got black screens after the champion select but fixed it when following some steps I found on google. Now my game starts but the only thing I see is mouse, I can hear sounds, I can use skills, I can move. I also don't see the champions portraits when game is loading.

replies.body: That might be an issue between your pc and it's graphics card not displaying the game properly. Hit up our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) and make sure you've gone through those steps as well as updating your graphics drivers.
